website_summaries.verdict: The FATCO Stank Stop deodorant combines the antibacterial properties of organic coconut oil with odor-neutralizing power of aluminum-free baking soda to create an all-natural deodorant. .
pros: Complete with grass-fed tallow and shea butter to moisturize, your armpits will thank you after each application
cons: You have to apply the deodorant with your fingers which may be unappealing to some people

customer_reviews.title: Best deodorant ever
customer_reviews.text: Best deodorant I have ever use! I have tried every pharmacy product, and none of them worked for me. I used to literally stink to the point that if I was away from home I had to wash my armpits wherever I was. (of course I take showers before leaving home). What I do now is I take a shower, then I spray alcohol mixed with white vinegar and then apply FATCO Stank Stop deodorant, and my life changed!! I have been using it for the last month and It has been working perfectly. I hope it continues forever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela L.

customer_reviews.title: This product works!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! I've looked my whole life for a product to control my underarm odor. As a female its especially humiliating to live with. This is the first and only product that has worked for me. I have 0 odor for the entire day. I'm impressed and highly recommend this!!! I'm a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Shopkinsmom

customer_reviews.title: Best Deodorant Out There
customer_reviews.text: I first found this at Target, and I'm purchasing it here again because this is by far the best natural deodorant I have ever tried. In fact I would say it works better than conventional deodorants. I can put it on in the morning, and wear it all day and into the next without smelling at all. It is incredible. I sweat a lot, but somehow when I wear this, I don't smell bad! The scent is very mild, and it does't leave any residue. I have tried almost every other natural deodorant out there, but nothing compares to this!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. Also, the fact that you have to scoop it out with your hand is messy in itself. Most of the product is absorbed onto the hand instead of the armpit. Within 30 minutes of putting this on I can smell a bad odor(worse than the natural odor) and under my armpit becomes clammy. I really wanted to like the idea of this after all the good reviews but it just doesn’t work. Money wasted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t smell pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I found this product on another site the regular deodorant I have been using has been breaking me out under my left arm. Yes that deodorant had all the bad stuff in it. When I saw this product I liked the name and I decided to buy it off of Amazon. I’m not used to putting cream under my arms but I remember my mom used to use a product that was in a cream form back in the 1960’s. So far so good I’m not too thrilled with the scent but I will have to get used to it and the real test will be in 93° weather next weekend at Disney World!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This product smells nice but does not work well. A few hours into work and I had to use my regular deodorant, thank god I brought it with me.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Better than anything else you'll try!
customer_reviews.text: Idk what exactly changed in me that normal store bought deodorant/ antiperspirant just wasn't cutting it. So, bought this. Needless to say, I'll never go back. An absolutely amazing product. It has smoothed my underarms in addition to eliminating odor. I'm not a heavy sweater so not sure if it could handle that. I do wish it came in a tube for easier application. I'm running out of q tips quicker than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Klisch

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like Stank Stop. I am an older woman and wanted a natural deodorant as opposed to the commercial kind. Stank Stop truly works to stop the stink. It's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: It’s tiny ! I just received it so I don’t know if it works yet but holy smokes this is small — update . It didn’t work for me . I really didn’t like the smell either
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: The best natural deodorant
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for several months now. It is literally the only deodorant strong enough to keep me smelling fresh. It has a nice, light lavender and sage scent . Unlike other natural deodorants, this one won’t cause irritation or skin peeling as I have experienced with others. It is small I’m size but a little bit goes a long way. It does not come with a dipping tool so you might want to purchase one or simple use your fingers and wash after. If you have trouble controlling armpit odor , this product is for you !
customer_reviews.author: melissa lozoya

customer_reviews.title: Stops the stank!!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! This literally is the best deodorant i have ever tried. I’ve dine rock crystals, toms deodorant, Jason deo- you name it. None worked. This deodorant is the epitome of stank stop! I highly suggest this for anyone looking for natural deodorant who has really stinky underarms!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Quattrochi

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Recently have had the worst issue with my armpits smelling horrible so I changed deodorants and tried like 7 different kinds. This works great for stopping smells, but I found that I sweat sooo much so I paired this with the pei wai deodorant and they work perfect together.
customer_reviews.author: Sydcratsenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and got my first container....it was empty. Immediately sent it back and they shipped a new one. Came full. Scent is great and not to overbearing. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Hoch24

customer_reviews.title: POWAFUL
customer_reviews.text: This stuff only suppressed the stank my sticky Indian co worker gave off from not showering. It’s a start though which is better than nothing. When he found out it was women’s deodorant he stopped using, gooosh darn! Going to need something stronger for sure as the smell is too pungent as if he hasn’t showered in months. I recommend this if your sensitive nasal passages are disrupted and violated by someone’s inner or outer gases and smells.
customer_reviews.author: The Coil Mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Expected to love this but it does not work. I'm not an overly "stinky" person but what smells great in the jar smells like b.o. and incense on me. Seriously disappointed. And the jar is itty bitty. Wasn't expecting that but, will find another use.
customer_reviews.author: Jayhawk in TX

customer_reviews.title: Oh It Works
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant is great! It does exactly what the name states. If you are looking for a deodorant that will keep your underarms from smelling this is the one to buy. If you put it on, on Monday it will keep you from smelling for 3 to 4 days and I do mean days.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt work. After an hour at work I started to notice armpit odor. I was really hoping that this product would be it. Guess I will have to continue my hunt for a natural deodorant that actually works
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me...
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this worked as well as advertised/reviewed by many, but unfortunately it did not work so great for me. It smells great & it did work a little bit, but I was hoping for something that was natural & could stop the BO smell, but this did not do that for me.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Erick

customer_reviews.title: Must try, it really works
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different natural deodorants and this one is the only one I absolutely feel confident using. It works great and it doesn't ruin your shirts like all the other ones do. I had to get used to the idea of running it on but now I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kali kayAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it but so expensive!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great and even lasts longer than you think it will for being such a tiny container, but it's still a REALLY tiny container. Really wish it was more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: asl

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! I am embarrassed to say that I am one stanky woman! I have literally tried everything! Every single drug store deodorant, every single natural deodorant sold at the store and have also ordered numerous different deodorants online and by far this is the best one I have ever tried! I have been using it for 2 weeks now and it’s just continued to get better and better everyday. Buy it you won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept, does not seem to work for these pits (sadly)
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell, it smells high quality and pure, but it almost made my pits smell worse! I will give it one more week (maybe dtox happening?) but not sure that this is going to work out!
customer_reviews.author: Meriel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. I paid too much for this not to work. I would not buy any of their products again. Not to mention you have to put it on with your hands. Very poor customer service and poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baking soda deo does not agree with me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had bad reactions to baking soda in deodorant and this was no exception. I reached out to the owner before ordering and was told that many people are able to use this deodorant despite past bad reactions so I gave it a try. Day 1 my pits were irritated and not happy. As far as smell it was great! I just can’t using baking soda deo, even this one. :(
customer_reviews.author: Heajai

customer_reviews.title: Very irritating - not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: very disappointing. Purchased this for sensitive skin and odor with activity and it did not work at all. Had an awful rash and no change in scent.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: AMZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I have really strong BO for a female and had a hard time finding a natural deodarant that actually worked for me. With FACTCO I need to look no furhter. I no longer smell like musty midway through the day and the cream blends in so no white residue is visible. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: EStro

customer_reviews.title: Best natural deodorant that I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Best natural deodorant that I've tried. I use a wooden applicator stick to apply it because it's too expensive to have it stuck under my nails. I used apple cider vinegar under my arms after the first use, and I haven't had an issue with any overwhelming scents since.
customer_reviews.author: Danied

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Stank Stop. I learned that I had to do an Armpit Detox and this deodorant lasts longer now. Stick form version would be great in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Krystina

customer_reviews.title: Too small!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only liked the aroma. The size is very small. Almost the size of my eye cream. And for the price I paid shame on you STANK. It did not last all day. I really regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa linda Mejia

customer_reviews.title: High price/Poor value/Pits still stank
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted to try this for her under arms so I ordered for her. After using it the first day she found that it doesn't help at all. She tried using it for a couple days and still poor results. Smells like Vicks. Overall very poor results for something that costs as much as this for as little you recieve.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product.. did not keep me fresh for even a few hours.. beware anyone that orders... I asked for a refund & must return the product first! Yuck!!!! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it works. I can use it for quite a while. But towards the end of the tub I start getting a slight reaction. I have tried natural deodorants before. This is the best one with least reaction.
customer_reviews.author: amy d

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this didn’t work for me. Deodorant is one of those things that is personal for each body. This may work on some people. I had to rush out of a business meeting and get the toxic stuff ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have to reapply throughout day
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a smelly person by any means. But I’m exploring deodorant options trying to go the healthy, aluminum free route so I started with this one. Smells good definitely when you apply the first time, but then you have to reapply and reapply due to smell. Now I’m onto the next kind to try...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it - it works
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I am sensitive to smells, but the light lavender and sage is very pleasant. You can use much less than the recommended pea-size amount. And, most importantly it really works to stop odor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the protection I get throughout the day.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Nothing has ever protected me like this product. All others never work as good and the seal will eventually break but this product is awesome and it works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Schreck

customer_reviews.title: this works
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually like natural deodorant..it doesn't work for me. this stuff, however, works perfectly. get it!
customer_reviews.author: LolaTru

customer_reviews.title: Takes care of embarrassing odors.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I am menopausal and this takes care of embarrassing odors. Finally a product that works.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine W.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It was suppose to come with 2 containers, it only came with one. And it didn’t even work, in fact it even irritated my skin
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: Works!  Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: This product works GREAT! I've tried several different products and nothing so far has worked. So happy I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: SLD

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it a 0 I would. I never leave reviews but spent $14 on 1oz of horrible deodorant if you can call it. Worked for an hour or so and like everyone said made you smell worse than with no deodorant!
customer_reviews.author: pao

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as described. Had to add deodorant within an hour of using this. Does not prevent odor.
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: Eh... Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. It was really clumpy and it didn’t work too well. Also I hate having to apply it with my fingers or applicator. Wasn’t really a fan so I just tossed it in my purse to use in case I ever forget deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: Kareena Razo

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: Like the smell good but I thought it would be bigger but it cool she love the product
customer_reviews.author: malik rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It takes some getting use to. It smells good. Easy to use. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Erica B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great. I’m disappointed with the size. Nothing else was working anymore for my granddaughter but this worked first time. It even last a couple of days. So impressed. I would just like for it to come in a larger size. Oh and it’s all natural
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: It stops my stank!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! It works great even on my most sweaty of days running or working out at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A pea size is all you need, really!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have worn this for 2 days now. Both days I took long 1 hour walks, ran multiple errands, sweated profusely under my blanket overnight. Underarm smells good! I still smelled great after a 2-hour cardio and weight-lifting session. Wow! I am sold!
customer_reviews.author: Amandine

customer_reviews.title: Smallest container you have ever seen...like sample sized.
customer_reviews.text: It was the smallest container I could imagine. I can’t imagine it will last 2 weeks! I will go back to Schmidt’s for the money and natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Returned because it did not counter my under arm order. It's too thick making it really hard to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Shedera Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: The only deodorant I have found to stop stank, drip , no residue on clothes. Silly application. But once you get over that it’s the best ever. You will no be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Keeps me dry and keeps me odor free
customer_reviews.author: shannon box

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Long time customer of Fatco, first time ordering from Amazon. LOVE LOVE LOVE this product! I'm allergic to aluminum, so this is the only product I can wear comfortably that really does STOP THA STANK!
customer_reviews.author: browneyedbeauty88

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I was looking for a natural deodorant that works in heat and humidity and this product did not fail me. Left me dry and smelling pretty.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: It works, but irritating for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this deodorant! It’s been the best natural option to keep my dry & smelling good- my only complaint is it irritates my skin. I’d love to see a sensitive skin formula with less or no baking soda!!
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Mendez

customer_reviews.title: excellent Product really works
customer_reviews.text: excellent Product really works, I have tried so many and finally found one that works, everyone should try the only downside is that it is in a jar inside of stick.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: It's great. You usually have to sacrifice efficacy with the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great. You usually have to sacrifice efficacy with the healthy stuff, but not with this, providing you use enough. The problem is the cost--$12 for a tiny tub--is prohibitive.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Scent sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The scent starts to smell stronger over time in a bad way.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell, just don't like having to apply it with my fingers; it gets under my fingernails :(
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a natural product that works and this one delivers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t prevent body order
customer_reviews.text: Did not take away body odor, if anything it was worse than any I tried
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Best healthy deodorant
customer_reviews.text: This is the best deodorant. Gentle for sensitive skin and smells great. Best long lasting healthy deodorant I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Cloche

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant works for all of 3 minutes before odor starts to come through, won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: V.Tyrre

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not stop my BO and gave me a rash
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui marin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stuff for a year and a half. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shawnna

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works really well. I’m only giving it 4 stars because the jar version is a little messier to use. I will order a tube if it next time.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: works at keeping stinky pits at bay
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite natural deodorant. Makes me feel fresh and not stinky.
customer_reviews.author: Carla tapia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't hate this product, but I don't see that it has helped.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Beesley

customer_reviews.title: I actually smell better if I don't use any deodorant than I do ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work, but evidently there's something that reacts with my body chemistry. I actually smell better if I don't use any deodorant than I do with this. Reapplying so I don't waste it is not an option! Back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate this 0 stars I would. I have stinky armpits and this literally did nothing. Secret works better than this BS. Only buy this if you want pure disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Health Friendly Deodorant
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product. I find it’s as good as my old deodorant with no negative ingredients. Will buy again. The lavender is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this product except I wish it came ...
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this product except I wish it came in a container that made it more convenient to apply. I have long nails and it's a pain to use my fingers. Applying with cotton pads or q-tips does not work well! The formula is amazing and I want to continue to buy the product but it is not convenient for me to use as my main deodorant. Referred by How I Built This podcast :)
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best, works great, have turned all my friends on to it!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Does not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Does not work for me. It gives me worse b.o. and makes my arm pits break out.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: This did not help me with my body odor. Does not work!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I've tried other aluminum free deodorants and they just don't work - this one WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!!!!!!  You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say ENOUGH about this ENTIRE Skincare line!!!! Speaking of stank stop, I have tried each and EVERY product line in the market with some less than fresh results. Until I met Stank Stop. I'm a believer and you will be, too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product works pretty well. I noticed one day that it didn't seem to work at well. The next time I used it I made sure to use the recommended "pea" size amount and it worked great. It's hard to find a natural product that works both as an antiperspirant and deodorant and this one seems to do the trick. However, I have not been able to put it to the workout test yet but plan to very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not stop the stank - will not buy again. Very expensive for 1oz.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I only need to apply this once a day to feel fresh. It's very healthy and moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Karina K

customer_reviews.title: Why the size of the product is to small for the price that i pay it look like a sample sizes
customer_reviews.text: The size, for the price that i pay is it to small for the actual size that show it
customer_reviews.author: Dalia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best natural deodorants out there that last. I wish the jar was bigger for it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jutila

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Deodorant
customer_reviews.text: Best natural deodorant I have ever used. I'm never stinky!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie & Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Happy 😊
customer_reviews.text: Works better than most of the products I have used
customer_reviews.author: Tina Bee

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this product for over a year ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over a year now and it works so well. I have very sensitive skin and I don't have a negative reaction to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Container was half empty
customer_reviews.text: The product works great. The only complaint is that the container was half empty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product! Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Good product! Works as described. Only thing I don't like is having to put it on with my finger as it often gets under my nails and then has to be washed down the drain and so a bit of waste. Would prefer a roll-on variety I think in the future.
customer_reviews.author: harry lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I just have super human BO
customer_reviews.text: I wish this in fact, did stop the stank. It didn't work for me. Maybe I just have super human BO. I really wanted it to work. It covers up the smell, just doesn't stop it. For $12/oz I will just keep reapplying all day until it's gone. It has a great smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Huggins

customer_reviews.title: worst deodorant that I've used in all my life long
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it 0 if I could.... worst deodorant that I've used in all my life long. Using it is exactly no different from not using anything. Completely waste of money... regretimg buying it...
customer_reviews.author: Fatemeh

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried like 20 different natural deodorants and had given up and went back to using normal deodorant. One of my family members was just diagnosed with breast cancer and I decided to give natural deodorant another try. To my surprise, this product works great! I have hyperhydrosis and used a few tips that I found through research and here is what I learned. I cleaned my armpits with alcohol before applying this deodorant. Also, I showered with a natural antibacterial soap called remedy soap.
customer_reviews.author: Katie N.

customer_reviews.title: Officially saying goodbye as your customer
customer_reviews.text: The squeeze tubes were the best at keeping my underarm odor away. Then they changed to the frustrating deodarant in a jar and are using a different formula. Does absolutely nothing. Underarm odor comes back within 20 minutes of using this and worse because it mixes with this fragrance! I don’t even have to sweat for it to stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love this deodorant
customer_reviews.text: Once your body detoxes from regular aluminum deodorants you will see the difference in using a natural deodorant. This is my favorite and I tried about 20 before finding this gem. Highly recommend it. If it is extremely hot you will need to reapply but you won't stink. This kills the bad odor. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Evie's Choices

customer_reviews.title: No more stink
customer_reviews.text: The best hands down. I’m currently 28 years old and have dealt with sweat/odor since puberty hit and it’s worse with me being 6 months postpartum. I have imbalanced hormones and sweat like crazy which means I’ll smell as well but after using this product it has done miracles for me. Days before it arrived I was having to shower twice a day (I was smelling like onions, gross I know) but after this I feel more confident and don’t have to worry about smelling anymore. I even let me husband smell them and I would never let him near my pits a month ago haha
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good but bad at the same time
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I received the product. I've been using it for more than a week know and I've noticed that even after I sweat, my underarms still smell good with this deodorant but I also started noticing that my armpits were turning really dark! Is this even supposed to happen? It does not say it no where on the box!
customer_reviews.author: Norma Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Small container but it works
customer_reviews.text: This product actually works. I have sensitive skin and I have always struggled with body odor after working out or a long day with regular deodorant. Which is embarrassing for a woman . I tried everything. Bought this to try and it works all day long. I just wish it was bigger size and made as a stick .
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: A little dab will do ya
customer_reviews.text: Menopause comes with some “interesting” changes, and suddenly, I didn’t feel like my usual deodorant was doing it’s job. This is not an antiperspirant, which I still need, but it does stop the smell. The jar is tiny, but you only need a pea sized amount to do it’s job. And it’s not just for the underarms. It’s good for any place that gets a little stanky.
customer_reviews.author: jatnj

customer_reviews.title: Weird texture and too many ingredients -- from a picky about my deodorant reviewer
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the reviews that say the formula isn't great. From all of the reviews that talked about the 'old formula vs new formula' I don't find what I received good. I do need to say that I make my own deodorant but wanted to try this for when I run out and don't have time to make a new batch. I've never had the older formula, but from the reviews it sounds like I would have liked that version. It's not a bad for those who don't care about all of the ingredients and aren't used to coconut oil based deodorants that rub into your skin and are barely there.
customer_reviews.author: tough but true

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I sweat A LOT, more than any female should. This product is one of the best ones out there (without harsh chemicals). I recommend trying it, if you are like me who is always conscious about armpit sweat
customer_reviews.author: MidwestTOCali

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful natural deodorant
customer_reviews.text: It is the best natural deodorant that I've ever used! I highly recommend this to anyone who wants a natural product that works.
customer_reviews.author: Devon M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. Been having trouble finding a deoderant to help since I've started working out more and this failed just like everything else. And the tub is tiny for 12 bucks. Not work it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Davis

product_meta.title: FATCO Stank Stop All Natural Deodorant Cream in a Jar with Tallow and Organic Coconut Oil – Lavender + Sage (1 oz)
feature_bullets: FATCO STANK STOP CREAM DEODORANT - Our paste combines the antibacterial properties of organic coconut oil with the odor neutralizing power of aluminum free baking soda and organic tallow to create this all natural, paleo certified, cream deodorant

WHY FATCO - Here at FATCO, all of the tallow that we use comes from grass fed, pasture raised, healthy & happy cows; we believe in supporting farmers and ranchers who are raising animals responsibly and ethically, and we do NOT believe in supporting factory farming

REAL FOOD FOR YOUR SKIN - Stank Stop is an aluminum, paraben free, all natural, certified cruelty free, paleo certified, non toxic, chemical free, and a truly effective organic deodorant cream for excessive sweating and body odor, giving your skin what it really needs

MADE IN THE USA - Using organic ingredients such as coconut oil, arrowroot powder, shea butter, sunflower seed wax, beeswax, lavender essential oil, clary sage essential oil and grass fed tallow to soothe and calm your most sensitive underarm skin safely

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - With our zero waste deodorant we use it all, from the nose to the tail, if you are not 100% satisfied with your FATCO product, we offer a full refund when purchased through FATCO on Amazon
